plot: Fatty rescues Mabel twice: first, from the unwelcome attentions of a masher, then from a runaway observation balloon.
title: Mabel's New Hero
plot_es: Fatty rescues Mabel twice: first, from the unwelcome attentions of a masher, then from a runaway observation balloon.
plot_en: Fatty rescues Mabel twice: first, from the unwelcome attentions of a masher, then from a runaway observation balloon.
